title: EnergyAustralia											Jan 2025 – Mar 2025
details:
EnergyAustralia											Jan 2025 – Mar 2025 	
Change Manager
LProvided portfolio governance and reporting support across regulatory and digital change programs.
Delivered strategic reports tracking initiative status, milestone delivery, and benefits realization.
Worked closely with the PMO to ensure portfolio hygiene, including schedule and risk updates.
Partnered with finance and operational stakeholders to align KPI reporting with strategic objectives.
Developed templates and reporting tools to improve consistency in performance tracking.
Facilitated continuous improvement initiatives in change reporting and business readiness processes.
Participated in project planning workshops to align system rollouts with operational and risk controls.

title: AIG Australia Limited										Jan 2020 – Oct 2024
details:
AIG Australia Limited										Jan 2020 – Oct 2024 	
Operations Program Lead and Business Support
Maintained portfolio-level risk registers and produced governance reports for executive reviews.
Led performance reporting for capex/opex tracking, benefits realization, and quarterly business reviews.
Supported data consolidation and Power BI dashboard design for initiative health and financial status.
Liaised with delivery teams to document issues, risks, and mitigation plans across multiple programs.
Established consistent reporting practices across business units aligned with portfolio metrics.
Delivered stakeholder insights to guide prioritization and strategic alignment decisions.
Facilitated leadership meetings to review risk mitigation strategies and performance against KPIs.

title: AIG Shared Services										Jan 2011 – Dec 2018
details:
AIG Shared Services										Jan 2011 – Dec 2018 	
IT Business Analyst
Coordinated operational reporting, project tracking, and planning support across transformation programs.
Worked with IT and business stakeholders to identify schedule risks and align reporting outputs.
Implemented reporting dashboards and standardized governance templates to streamline stakeholder communication.
Documented key project risks, escalations, and tracked resolution status across distributed teams.
Contributed to the continuous improvement of delivery governance and reporting frameworks.
Supported integration of reporting data into service delivery and business operations dashboards.
Supported service inspections and coordinated stakeholder reporting during process migrations.

title: ACS Xerox											Jan 2010 – Nov 2011
details:
ACS Xerox											Jan 2010 – Nov 2011 	
Process Improvement Leader
Conducted service workflow reviews and recommended enhancements for customer support operations.
Developed training and reporting tools to monitor service desk trends and identify opportunities for performance uplift.
Developed communication assets, onboarding packs, and FAQs to support delivery.
Facilitated workshops to explain process changes and capture staff feedback.
Contributed to internal change newsletters and support content across business units.
Monitored uptake and stakeholder sentiment using structured feedback tools.
Referee details available on request
